scripts.lint:fix: echo 'Fixing lint issues...' && echo 'No linter configured yet'
scripts.type-check: echo 'Type checking...' && echo 'No type checker configured yet'
scripts.format: echo 'Formatting code...' && echo 'No formatter configured yet'
scripts.format:check: echo 'Checking code format...' && echo 'No formatter configured yet'
scripts.analyze: vite build --mode analyze && echo 'Bundle analysis complete'
